GSD.description:
scsi: libfc: Fix use after free in fc_exch_abts_resp()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.276 by commit 499d198494e77b6533251b9b909baf5c101129cb. For more details please see the references link.
